author: _shemnon
content: I will not be attending.  Let's take the no and move on.

author: poojaranjan
content: We don't intend to record this call unless requested. So join if you'd like to have a general chat!

author: poojaranjan
content:
Had a quick meeting today ‚Äî thank you team Ipsilon and everyone who joined in!

- EOF status update and potential champion expected early next week.
- EEST will preserve the EOF testing work for future upgrade considerations.
- Ipsilon team will consider to bring the team's paper on RICSV and EOF into the next ACD meeting‚Äôs agenda to increase visibility.

Thank you all for your contribution üôè
